QuestData.Title: Observing the Sporelings
QuestData.Description: We need to learn all that we can of the sporelings at Sporeggar and their relationship to the creatures around them. One way to do that is what I'm doing; passive observation while making a note of their interactions.$B$BI need you to head over to the Spawning Glen to the west. Investigate the whole area and then return to tell me what you saw.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Spawning Glen in Zangarmarsh, and then report back to Watcher Leesa'oh at the Cenarion Watchpost in Zangarmarsh with your findings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Back so soon? Your observation of the Sporeggar sporelings is critical to my research. I hope you aren't the type to rush things. Show patience and make certain that you have explored the entirety of the Spawning Glen before giving me your final report.
QuestData.RewardText: What?! The bog lords of Quagg Ridge are EATING the sporelings' pods? This isn't good!
